name: CardioMedica
0:
”Alexa, open cardio medica”
”Alexa, start cardio medica”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cardio medica
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill features audio and video presentations from the International Atherosclerosis Society (IAS) Education Library. The information presented is designed for medical professionals in the care of patients with diseases related to atherosclerosis. Presentation last 30 minutes or less and feature a global faculty or leaders in medicine. Information about the IAS can be found at www.athero.org 

Regarding medical related content: The IAS is a global non-profit medical organization that seeks to address health-related issues related to atherosclerosis and related disease. The information presented in this site is for informational and educational purposes only and not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment by a qualified medical professional. If you are a patient in need of care or considering care, call your doctor for appropriate medical evaluation and advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
